listing-unavailable: We’re sorry, but this listing is no longer available
item-not-available: This item is no longer available

remove-modal.title: Remove listing
remove-modal.answer: This action cannot be undone and you will lose any current counter offers! To proceed with the removal, make a selection below.
remove-modal.question: Are you sure you’d like to remove this listing?
remove-modal.radio-text: Yes, I’m absolutely sure. Please remove my listing!
remove-modal.removal-succesful: Your listing has been successfully removed!
remove-modal.create-listing-suggestion: Feel free to create another listing at any time

accept-counter-offer-modal.title: Accept counter offer
accept-counter-offer-modal.question: Are you sure you’d like to accept the offer from %{username} ?
accept-counter-offer-modal.radio-text: Yes, I’m sure I’d like to accept the offer
